titles.title: Physician Shortage Minimization Act of 2015
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to clarify the treatment of locum tenens physicians as independent contractors to help alleviate physician shortages in underserved areas.
Physician Shortage Minimization Act of 2015

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Physician Shortage Minimization Act of 2015
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to classify, for employment tax purposes, certain physicians who provide medical services for a temporary period (locum tenens physicians) as independent contractors rather than as employees.
